document.full_text: rising violence from drug cartels and street gangs in central america is costing the region up to 8 percent of gross domestic product and could hit future growth, the world bank said on thursday.
document.title: violence to hit central america growth: world bank
lines_and_colors: rising violence from drug cartels and street gangs in central america is costing the region up to 8 percent of gross domestic product and could hit future growth, the world bank said on thursday.
